DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Yoga Resistance Exercise Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: To determine feasibility combine therapeutic yoga resistance exercise intervention lung cancer survivor caregiver . A single group intervention study design use pilot feasibility trial . Brochures information study distribute Cross Cancer Institute , interested individual screen eligibility . A convenient sampling technique use recruit individual lung cancer caregiver . Participants deem eligible take part study provide write informed consent participate study undergo baseline testing . The intervention carry period 8 week . The feasibility outcomes include eligibility rate , completion rate , adherence rate adverse event . Dyspnea primary self-reported outcome measure individual lung cancer . The secondary outcome include fatigue , shoulder range motion , chest expansion , muscular strength . The outcome measure caregiver include quality life ( QoL ) muscular strength .
